OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD WING CHUN KUNG FU CENTRE

Desc.entry: Affiliated to the Samuel Kwok Martial Arts Association and the British Council for Chinese Martial Arts. Fast effective close range fighting system for adults and juniors aged 14 years and over. Gradings and seminars held throughout the year. One-to-one tuition available.

ProvisionPlace.entry: Carwood Road (main entrance on Carlisle Street)
